articles.content: Former Watford head coach Rob Edwards has become the new Luton Town manager on a three-and-a-half-year contract and Hatters chief executive greeted the announcement with a comment that will certainly… [+3752 chars]

articles.author: Marc Iles
articles.title: Bug sweeps Bolton Wanderers camp before Fleetwood Town trip - The Bolton News
articles.description: Wanderers have been hit by a number of illnesses in the build up to their League One game at Fleetwood Town.
articles.content:
Wanderers have been hit hard by a sickness bug in the build-up to their game at Fleetwood Town this weekend.

articles.description: Twenty-one year-old Jack van Poortvliet starts ahead of Leicester team-mate Ben Youngs in the England team to face New Zealand on Saturday.
articles.content:
Van Poortvliet made his England debut during last summer's series win over Australia
